name: Dark Brown Jaggery
description: Rich, dark jaggery with a deep, molasses-like flavor. Perfect for traditional recipes and a natural alternative to refined sugar.
ingredients: 100% pure sugarcane jaggery, No preservatives, No chemicals.
sourcing: Sourced from organic sugarcane farms in Maharashtra, India.
health_benefits: Rich in iron, helps prevent anemia
Aids digestion and detoxifies the liver
Regulates body temperature and keeps the body warm in winter

recommended_uses.text: Use in tea, coffee, and warm beverages
Ideal for making Indian sweets like chikki and til ladoo
Add to marinades for a deep, caramelized flavor

storage: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.
shelf_life: Best before 9 months from the date of packaging.

name: Dark Gold Jaggery
description: Smooth and aromatic jaggery with a golden hue. Ideal for desserts, beverages, and baking.
ingredients: 100% pure sugarcane jaggery, No preservatives, No artificial colors.
sourcing: Harvested from organic sugarcane fields in Karnataka, India.
health_benefits: Acts as a natural blood purifier
Rich in essential minerals for bone strength
Helps boost metabolism and control weight

recommended_uses.text: Perfect for baking cakes, cookies, and energy bars
Adds a rich caramelized taste to smoothies and shakes
Use in traditional drinks like buttermilk or lemonade

storage: Store in a dry place away from direct sunlight.
shelf_life: Best before 8 months from the date of packaging.

name: Jaggery Powder
description: Finely ground jaggery for easy use in recipes. A healthier substitute for refined sugar.
ingredients: 100% natural jaggery, No preservatives, No added flavors.
sourcing: Handmade from sun-dried sugarcane juice in Punjab, India.
health_benefits: Rich in essential minerals for energy production
Helps in detoxification and cleansing of the liver
Balances acidity and boosts gut health

recommended_uses.text: Perfect replacement for sugar in baking and cooking
Use in protein shakes or smoothie bowls
Ideal for sprinkling over oats, cereal, or yogurt

storage: Store in a sealed jar in a cool, dry place.
shelf_life: Best before 12 months from the date of packaging.
